answers.answer: No worried unless your doctor tells u so. I was 30 weeks measuring at 32. I am now 32 weeks and 6 days my next appointment is Tuesday. So hopefully all is well. But I wouldn't worry too much...Congratulations!!!
Im messuring 2 weeks ahead also. Im just not buying many newborn stuff lol, he'll probably be over 8 lbs

question: So i was just woundering.....im 28 weeks pregnant and im measuring 31 weeks.....i was woundering if there is anything i need to worr about or some advice would be nice...i was tested for gestational diabetes and i dont have it and its my first baby....so i guessi just need some advice
title: measuringbig
